animeTitle: Ojisan to Marshmallow: Hige-san to Yume Mashmallow
animeDescription: Habahiro Hige awakens at his desk at work, but much to his surprise, he has become a baby! To make things stranger, Iori Wakabayashi walks in wearing a school uniform but doesn't recognize him as the baby. Upon being picked up and held by her, Hige discovers that he doesn't just have the body of a baby but the mind of one as well.  [Written by MAL Rewrite]
animeStaff: [['Satake Hideyuki', ['Animation Director']], ['Tsutsui Noriko', ['Background Art']], ['Hanai Yutsuko', ['2nd Key Animation', 'Animation Director']]]
